subsections.title: Classes of Licenses
subsections.label: subsec:license-classes-overview
prompts: Explain the different classes of amateur radio licenses currently available from the FCC, including their respective privileges and requirements.
Discuss the historical context of license classes and how they have evolved over time.
Provide a comparison of the privileges granted to each license class, focusing on frequency access and modes of operation.

image_prompts.prompt: Flowchart showing the hierarchy of amateur radio license classes and their privileges.
image_prompts.caption: Hierarchy of Amateur Radio License Classes
image_prompts.label: fig:license-hierarchy

table_prompt.prompt: Create a table comparing the privileges of Technician, General, and Amateur Extra license classes.
table_prompt.caption: Comparison of License Class Privileges
table_prompt.label: tab:license-privileges

subsections.title: HF/VHF/UHF Privileges and Sub-bands
subsections.label: subsec:freq-privs
prompts: Explain the frequency privileges for Technician, General, and Amateur Extra licensees across HF, VHF, and UHF bands.
Discuss the concept of sub-bands and how they are allocated for different modes of operation (e.g., CW, phone, digital).
Describe the restrictions and considerations for operating in segments where the Amateur Radio Service is secondary.
Explain the importance of avoiding the edges of bands and sub-bands, including technical reasons such as frequency drift and sideband interference.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing the allocation of HF, VHF, and UHF bands for different license classes.
image_prompts.caption: Frequency Band Allocation by License Class
image_prompts.label: fig:band-allocation

image_prompts.prompt: Illustration of modulation sidebands extending beyond the band edge, showing why operating at the edge is discouraged.
image_prompts.caption: Modulation Sidebands and Band Edge Considerations
image_prompts.label: fig:sidebands

table_prompt.prompt: Create a table summarizing the frequency privileges for Technician, General, and Amateur Extra licensees across HF, VHF, and UHF bands.
table_prompt.caption: Frequency Privileges by License Class
table_prompt.label: tab:freq-privileges
